title: 开服时出现问题MOD HAS DIRECT REFERENCE System.exit(
author: Cae-sar

replies.author: Cae-sar
replies.txt_content:
[14:51:56] [main/警告] [FML]: =============================================================
[14:51:56] [main/警告] [FML]: MOD HAS DIRECT REFERENCE System.exit() THIS IS NOT ALLOWED REROUTING TO FML!
[14:51:56] [main/警告] [FML]: Offendor: net/minecraft/server/gui/MinecraftServerGui$1.windowClosing(Ljava/awt/event/WindowEvent;)V
[14:51:56] [main/WARN] [FML]: Use FMLCommonHandler.exitJava instead
[14:51:56] [main/警告] [FML]: =============================================================

replies.author: SakuraKooi
replies.txt_content:
出现这个警告的原因是fml禁止直接使用System.exit()退出游戏
forge提供了一个替代的方法:FMLCommonHandler.exitJava()
不需要进行处理,也不会产生什么问题

replies.author: ma1879493445
replies.txt_content: 你的mod冲突了 是不是按很多mod？
